1: One day my sister and I were walking near the road.
2: A big truck was driving down the hill.
3:
A car was speeding
up the hill.
4:
The truck driver was talking on his mobile phone.
He was not looking
at the road.
5: The truck smashed into the car!
6: An ambulance and the police came to help.
7:
Two tow trucks came.
One towed the truck.
The other towed the car.
8:
We saw everything.
We were shocked.
